attributes.action: Let all women in the UK get free available sanitary products for whatever age.
attributes.additional_details: It’s unacceptable that people are spending money on sanitation products. If men had periods, all sanitary products would be free. The society now is disgraceful.
attributes.background: Make sanitary products free for all women

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
